00019 #ifndef _IPL98_KERNEL_HISTORY_H
00020 #define _IPL98_KERNEL_HISTORY_H
00021 
00022 #include "../ipl98_setup.h" /* always include the setup file */
00023 #include <string.h>
00024 
00025 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00026 namespace ipl{ /* use namespace if C++ */
00027 extern "C" { /* prevent name mangling for C functions */
00028 #endif
00029 
00030 /************************************************/
00031 /********     Internal history indent    ********/
00032 /********           manipulation         ********/
00033 /************************************************/
00034 
00035 
00054 extern char ipl_HistoryIndent[]; /* contains a number of tabulator characters ('\t') used for indenting the history text */
00056 #define k_IplStartHistoryMacro() {ipl_HistoryIndent[strlen(ipl_HistoryIndent)+1]='\0';memset(ipl_HistoryIndent,'\t',strlen(ipl_HistoryIndent)+1);}
00057 
00058 #define k_IplStopHistoryMacro() {ipl_HistoryIndent[strlen(ipl_HistoryIndent)-1]='\0';}
00059  /* end group "history" */
00061 
00062 #ifdef _IPL98_USING_CPP
00063 } /* end of extern "C" */
00064 } /* end namespace ipl */
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #endif /* _IPL98_KERNEL_HISTORY_H */
